muda yatinile suti yalipisinisi wazamaya anze azuba kwai bukaufi ni wachi
mwanana yomuinyani utinile hembe yesweu ni bulukwe bwamubala obata kuswana niwa mai, usweli waitusisa lisila ni mezi kukenisa fafasaa sibaka sakuapehela lico mwandu
muchembele wakwa Asia, yatinile hembe yesweu, yamazoho yamakuswani,  ni bulukwe bwamubala obata kuswana sina wa malu uinzi fa museme inge aeza papali yakuikotolola mubili
musali yabonahala hande mwa litino zende zetula, uzuba kwai yasweli mwalizoho lililimwi mi lelimwi usweli komoki ya gilasi yenani waine

muuna usweli kataata fa pizi yasweli kumata mwahalaa batu baba buha

muuna yasweli ndembela yesweu, bufubelu ni mubala obata kuswana niwa malu, yenani naleli, uinanuzi inge ipekauka mwa moya

baana baba beli bapahama licwe lelituna leli nani ni licalo zemela fateni

mutangana wa yamba litapi kwa nuka mi obatile kuhohelwa mwa mezi

muuna yatinile kuwani yesweu ni hembe, uinzi fa tafule inge amizeza mati kulube yebesizwe
mudala wakwa India utinile liapalo zepazuhile mi ulobezi fafasi inge abeile toho yahae fa mukotana
muuna ni musali yomukima hahulu bainzi fa sipula samabalelo inge bacha muselo wa tolwani yemwi
bosinyalana batinile liapalo zakutapela mwateni mi baswalani mazoho inge bazamaya fa likamba la liwate
sikwata sa batu sikopani kuto buha muuna yasweli kubulela kwapataa bona
musali usweli wabulela kwapataa batu kokuñozwi kuli "Armenian Genocide"

mwanaa musizani yatinile zamibala-bala ubuha mushimani yanwa mwa botela mwa mukwakwa otezi batu
musali yo ubonahala kuitukiseza kupahama macwe amatuna kamba kubuha feela malu mwahalimu
mutu yatinile kuwani uinzi mwa bucwani mi kunani lilundu kwamulaho
muuna yatinile hembe yamishulundu yamubala oswana sina wa malu wazamaya mwa mukwakwa abeile mazoho mwamapokoto
mutu wa milili yemifubelu unani miñolo fa litalo lahae lakwa mukokoto, uinzi  bukaufi ni sishingwa sakota
sikwata sa baty sazamaya sishetumuka mwa mukwakwa ofita feela batu babazamaya kamahutu oinzi bukaufi ni likota zetuna, omwa Asia
musali yatibile kaputula kamwahali kakasweu uyemi fa likamba la liwate
batu bamilili yemitelele batinile likochi ni litaulo kwa toho mi mañi ni mañi ufulalezi yomumwi
mbututu wamusizani utinile liapalo zenani mihala yetamilwe mwatasaa mazoho mi ulobezi fafasi inge alila
mutangana uyemi fa kapula ni lihutu lililimwi mi yomumwi usweli wabapala mwamunyako
simbaya-mbaya sesi bata kuswana inge sitima sazamaya fa njanji inge sishetumuka mwa mukwakwa opatehile  mi batu babazamaya ka mahutu balitela kuli batule mukwakwa
muyaho obonahala kuyubekiwa, wakale, onani limota la mubala obata kuswana niwa mai, minyako yetala ni samende yafafasi yebeilwe mubala omufubelu
musizani wa milili yemifubelu utinile sikochi sesi sweu mi unanuzi mukotana wakwa mukokoto omufubelu
mwanana yomuinyani uinzi fa simunyelule asina zanahala mwatoho yahae
muuna yatinile jakete yensu nibufubelu, hembe yamubala obata kuswana niwa malu, zakuikabisa zamwa mulala za silivela ni bulukwe bwamubala obata kuswana niwa malu
banana basweli babapala mi balatiwa baba beli bakutisana fa lizazi leli chisa
sikwata sa baana babatinile liapalo zeswana za mubala obata kuswana niwa malu, basweli litobolo inge bazamaya bashetumuka mwa mukwakwa
batu baba ketalizoho nihalimumwi bainzi fa sipula sa mabalelo sesinzi kwatuko amukwakwa, fapataa sibaka sesi lukisa lico
muuna yatinile hembe ni bulukwe ni musali yatinile hembe yetala ni kaputula kakakuswani kakansu
baana ni basali babañata, batinile liapalo zafeela feela inge bainzi fa tupula mwatasaa tente yetala
batu baba beli bacha fa tafule yemwa tasaa sikuku sesi tuna
mushimani yomuinyani wamwa Africa uinzi fa kasipi kakanani zibiso yaku yema
